::Feline::

She smiled and purred softly.  "Yes thank you.  I'd appreciate a tour 
very much."  She walked slong side Skulletron, all the while, 
scanning every bit of the ship to memory.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>         Skulletron smiled as Feline walked away.  He started 
towards her
> slowly.
> 
>       He was thinking about what Firearm said about two Maximals 
under
> attack.  Nobody knew his little secret.  This whole time, he had 
his mind
> connected with the Cybertronian Fire.  He read the scanners.  The 
two
> Maximals under attack.  That was the Alliance's work.  Also, by this
> connection, he now knew the Cybertronian Fire like his back hand.  
He loved
> his little mental ability.  He loved it so much, that it even 
scared him.
> He also saw what was going on in just about every part of the 
ship.  He
> usually never paid attention to any of it, but he did like keeping 
a close
> eye on things.  He ran up beside Feline.
> 
>         He snickered, "Still want that tour??  The one that Chordate
> promised but hasn't given you???  I can show you much of the ship.  
Some of
> the Maximals left, to go save fellow Maximals from 
the...Alliance!!  Hehe.
> I can show you around, if you want, beautiful," He said, grinning.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>

as

> > shoulder to see if Skulletron was following her or not. Then faces
> > back down the hall with a slight smile on her face.
